meta.title: Aeromagnetic Survey
meta.description: A raster visualization of the 1955 [Great Britain aeromagnetic survey](https://www.bgs.ac.uk/datasets/gb-aeromagnetic-survey/), which measured the Earthâ€™s magnetic field by plane. Each sample recorded the longitude and latitude alongside the strength of the [IGRF](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/international-geomagnetic-reference-field) in [nanoteslas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tesla_(unit)). This example demonstrates both raster interpolation and smoothing (blur) options.
